pageTitle: Re: Horrible EM-5 Amazon user review: Micro Four Thirds Talk Forum: Digital Photography Review
textBeforeTable: Flat view Next unread Next Previous First Parent Forum Complain Reply   Reply with quote   Paul Thank you. I am strongly considering this camera and as I was planning it's purchase, I was looking for valuable reviews. The OT post and also your post were very useful to me. you just wrote down everything I was thinking after reading the Amazon "critical review". Sir, Apr 29, 2012 tgutgu, In reply to Re: Horrible EM-5 Amazon user review
